title: 102 Scenes for 2 Actors
description: The Ultimate Scene Study Series is a colossal new resource for actors, directors, and acting teachers. The scenes for 2 actors in the volume include selections The Persians by Aeschylus, The Clouds by Aristophanes, Medea by Seneca, The Duchess of Malfi by John Webster, The Virtuoso by Thomas Shadwell, and Tartuffe by Moliere.
author: Jocelyn A. Beard
